title: 2021 NFL Draft Lookahead: Trevor Lawrence vs. Justin Fields, Stock Up for QBs Mac Jones, Kyle Trask, Zach Wilson (Football 11/17)
description:
It's never too early for draft talk and that's exactly what you get on this episode. Ryan Wilson is joined by Josh Edwards to take a glimpse at the 2021 NFL Draft which a focus on the players that have improved their stock during this college football season. We have to start at the top. Trevor Lawrence has long been penciled in as the #1 pick in this class, but Justin Fields is narrowing the gap with his stellar play for Ohio State. That's not all the quarterback talk though. Ryan has been very impressed by Mac Jones from Alabama, Kyle Trask from Florida and Zach Wilson from BYU. The guys evaluate their strengths and weaknesses as well as their potential draft range when April rolls around. Both Ryan and Josh offer more 'Stock Up' candidates on this early draft breakdown. 
'Pick Six' is available on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, Stitcher, Google Podcasts, Castbox and wherever else you listen to podcasts. 
Follow the Pick Six team on Twitter: @picksixpod, @ryanwilsonCBS, @EdwardsCBS, @E_DeBerardinis
Visit the Pick Six YouTube channel: https://www.youtube.com/picksix
